company_overview.Name: BeiGene, Ltd.
company_overview.Description: BeiGene, Ltd., an oncology company, engages in discovering and developing various treatments for cancer patients in the United States, China, Europe, and internationally. The company is headquartered in Camana Bay, the Cayman Islands.
company_overview.Address: C/O MOURANT GOVERNANCE SERVICES (CAYMAN), 94 SOLARIS AVENUE, CAMANA BAY, GRAND CAYMAN, KY
